attributes.action: Demand that MPs should pay back their claimed expenses to the tax payer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs claimed their expenses for lawnmowers, silk cushions, etc., this list is endless.  Surely they can afford to pay for these from their fat wages.   MPs should pay back their expenses back to Tax payer.  Tax payers are struggling to pay their bills.

Lots of people on Working tax credit were paid in error.  They had to pay this back.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
